maiet.SCRIPT:
--[[ 베루스 --]]
function NPC_106001:Init(NPCID) NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 1) end
function Verus_Ignition(ThisNPC, Enemy) if(ThisNPC:CheckBuff(40050) == false and ThisNPC:CheckBuff(40053) == false) then if(ThisNPC:CheckBPart(1) == true and ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) == true) then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(210600158) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(210600112) end end end
function NPC_106001:OnFinishActivateBuff(ThisNPC, Enemy) ThisNPC:GainBuff(40050) end
function NPC_106001:OnFinishActivateBuff2(ThisNPC, Enemy) ThisNPC:GainBuff(40052) end
function NPC_106001:OnHitCapsule_0_0(HitInfo) local victim = AsNPC( HitInfo.Victim ) local hpRate = victim:GetHP()/victim:GetMaxHP()
if(this:CheckBuff(40050) == false and this:CheckBuff(40052) == false and hpRate < 0.5) then -- '연옥의 불꽃'과 '암흑의 불꽃' 버프가 없을 때에만 누적 데미지로 인정 local totalDamage = victim:GetUserData(1) + HitInfo.Damage
if(totalDamage > 1500) then if (victim:CheckBPart(1) == false) then victim:ClearJob() victim:BreakPart(1, HitInfo.Attacker) victim:UseTalentSelf(210600120) elseif(victim:CheckBPart(2) == false) then victim:ClearJob() victim:BreakPart(2, HitInfo.Attacker) victim:RemoveBuff(40050) victim:GainBuff(40052) victim:UseTalentSelf(210600121) end totalDamage = 0 else HitInfo.MF:Adjust(MF_BEATEN, 60, 1500) end
victim:SetUserData(1, totalDamage) end
return HitInfo end
